replies.body:
Opinions on me?


Nah, just kidding


Opinions on yourself?
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions on me?


Nah, just kidding


Opinions on yourself?

replies.body:
Hardest question ever O-O

Ok uhm how can I phrase that without sounding arrogant :x ? 

So ok, well I think I am quite good at pvp but also not nearly the best. I think defending is what I can do best in scrims, but I can still improve alot. I am always trying to be happy and not get really angry. I am trying not to be to egoistic and I am probs sometimes bit to arrogant I think.. 

The End,

replies.body:
Gosh really ? ._.

ok.. ok

Let's start first with your Personality

You are always happy, you never rage but also like to troll alot (like Budah right now :p), like tazz you are more of the leader guy but you can also easily get distracted. As a moderator you always try to help other people out and do it in a very proffessional way. 

In terms of PVP skills, you are quite good with the sword but your obviosuly better with the bow, which makes you good on a skybridge or archer tower. Play a bit less CS:go though and get more active :p
